content:
<table-wrap id="tbl1" orientation="portrait" position="float">
<label>1</label>
<caption>
<title>Lennard-Jones Parameters for the Adsorbates
Used, Where ε is the LJ Well Depth, <italic toggle="yes">k</italic>
<sub>B</sub> is the Boltzmann Constant, and σ is the Molecular Diameter</title>
</caption>
<oasis:table colsep="0" rowsep="0">
<oasis:tgroup cols="4">
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col1"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="." colname="col2"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="." colname="col3"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col4"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:thead>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry align="center">adsorbate</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">σ (Å)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">ε/<italic toggle="yes">k</italic>
<sub>B</sub> (K)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">ref</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:thead>
<oasis:tbody>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>H<sub>2</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.958</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>36.7</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref29" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>CH<sub>4</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>3.73</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>148.0</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref30" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>CF<sub>4</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>4.662</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>134.0</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref13" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>SF<sub>6</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>5.128</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>222.1</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref13" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>alkane CH<sub>3</sub> group</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>3.75</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>98.0</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref30" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>alkane CH<sub>2</sub> group</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>3.95</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>46.0</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref30" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>C (in CO<sub>2</sub>)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.8</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>27.0</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref31" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>O (in CO<sub>2</sub>)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>3.05</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>79.0</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="ref31" specific-use="ref-style=base-text"></xref>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:tbody>
</oasis:tgroup>
</oasis:table>
</table-wrap>
clean_text:
Table 1. Lennard-Jones Parameters for the Adsorbates Used, Where ε is the LJ Well Depth, k<sub>B</sub> is the Boltzmann Constant, and σ is the Molecular Diameter

| adsorbate | σ (Å) | ε/k<sub>B</sub> (K) | ref |
|-----------|-------|--------------------|-----|
| H<sub>2</sub> | 2.958 | 36.7 | [^ref29] |
| CH<sub>4</sub> | 3.73 | 148.0 | [^ref30] |
| CF<sub>4</sub> | 4.662 | 134.0 | [^ref13] |
| SF<sub>6</sub> | 5.128 | 222.1 | [^ref13] |
| alkane CH<sub>3</sub> group | 3.75 | 98.0 | [^ref30] |
| alkane CH<sub>2</sub> group | 3.95 | 46.0 | [^ref30] |
| C (in CO<sub>2</sub>) | 2.8 | 27.0 | [^ref31] |
| O (in CO<sub>2</sub>) | 3.05 | 79.0 | [^ref31] |
